parameters.name: order
parameters.description: asc for ascending, desc for descending

patch.description: accept one or more fields to update user profile. Example: firstName, lastName, phone, password, email, avatar

get.description: if param cardNumber is empty, it will return all user payments, if cardNumber is provided, it will filter by cardNumber

parameters.name: cardNumber
parameters.description: Card number may be a part of the card number, for example, 4111 or 13

post.description: Add new payment card to user profile. If card already exists, it will return 409 status code, when success, it will return all user payments

delete.description: Delete payment card from user profile by paymentId when success, it will return all user payments without deleted card
